dict.acceptation: 申请，请求，适用；适用，适合；专心致志；

sent.orig: Confirm the changes by clicking on Apply.
sent.trans: 点击应用(Apply)按钮来确认您的更改。

sent.orig: Click Apply to confirm the changes and go ahead with the upgrade.
sent.trans: 点击应用(Apply)来确认您的更改并继续升级。

sent.orig: We should apply advanced experience according to local conditions and shouldn't apply it mechanically.
sent.trans: 对先进的经验我们应该因地制宜，不应生搬硬套。

sent.orig: One says "Apply this change," and the other says "Don't apply this change."
sent.trans: 一个意在“施加改变”，而另外一个意在“不要施加改变”。

sent.orig: So Hong Kong bankers should apply immediately. The earlier you apply,the sooner you will get approval.
sent.trans: 香港银行家赶快申请，申请得越早，批准得越快。
